DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to describe the night-time use of an investigational lubricant eye drop.
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation of the Nighttime Retention of Effect of an Investigational Lubricant Eye Drop (FID 115958D)
DOC.criteria: 1. Documented diagnosis of dry eye 2. Current use of an eye ointment or tube gel 1. No nighttime contact lenses wear throughout the study period 2. Must not have had punctal plugs inserted within 30 days preceding enrollment
